title: Downtown Nanjing Sofitel Retreat with Two Restaurants, Indoor Pool & Spa
description:
Rising above Nanjing's glittering skyline, Sofitel Nanjing Galaxy Suning enchants with its perfect fusion of French elegance and Chinese grandeur. This urban sanctuary captivates with sumptuous suites, mesmerising city vistas and close proximity to historic treasures.

Surrender to indulgence as expert chefs craft culinary masterpieces, from refined Huaiyhang cuisine to international all-day dining. Let the blissful onsite spa melt away your worldly cares while attentive staff anticipate your desires before they're even spoken. Welcome to a place where ancient dynasties once ruled and modern China hums with possibility.

title: Elegant Five-Star Nanjing Escape with Seven Onsite Restaurants & Bars
description: Explore the timeless history and culture of this graceful city with a luxurious stay at the five-star InterContinental Nanjing, an IHG Hotel. An architectural masterpiece, the hotel towers over the neighbouring buildings to offer stunning views of the city and Xuanwu Lake, and guests can choose from seven onsite restaurants and bars. Spend the day discovering the beautiful heritage streets and discover why Nanjing has been referred to as one of China’s most picturesque cities.
offer_address: No. 1 Zhong Yang Road, Gulou District, Nanjing, 210008, China

title: China Sophisticated Oasis in the Heart of Nanjing with Two Onsite Restaurants
description: Escape to one of China’s most picturesque cities with a stay at voco Nanjing Oriental Pearl, an IHG Hotel. Discover the timeless culture and ancestry of this handsome city as you wander the Zhonghua Gate - dating back to the 14th century - interact with the locals and soak in the beautiful landscapes comprised of peaceful lakes and lush greenery. Meanwhile, the hotel promises everything you need to relax after a day on the town, including an onsite fitness centre and two restaurants.
location_description: voco Nanjing Oriental Pearl, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 389 Zhujiang Road, Xuanwu District, Nanjing 210018 China

title: Serene China Verdant Escape near Nanjing
description: Serene verdant greenery and scenic landscapes await at voco Nanjing Garden Expo, an IHG Hotel, an oasis of calm away from the bustling city. Grab a bite to eat in the restaurant or a relaxed drink after dark in the lounge. Work up a sweat at the fitness centre or venture out for a thrilling adventure to the nearby Happy Valley Nanjing theme park. Explore the tranquil Jiangsu Garden Expo Park and connect with nature before retiring to your room for a long and relaxing soak.
location_description: voco Nanjing Garden Expo, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 9 Shenghu Road, Tangshan Street, Jiangning District, Nanjing 211131, China

title: Tranquil Mountainside China Escape with Idyllic Valley Views
description: A sparkling beacon of luxury tucked among a valley of breathtaking mountains, Hotel Indigo Nanjing Garden Expo, an IHG Hotel boasts incredible views overlooking the Regeneration Garden, flower terrace and surrounding excavated rock walls. Embrace true tranquility as you listen to the glimmering river flow through the hotel, breath in the soft floral scent of the terrace garden, and taste the authentic food of the area with a specialty in-house immersive dining experience.
location_description: Hotel Indigo Nanjing Garden Expo, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: No.8 Linxiu Road, Tangshan Street, Jiangning District, Nanjing, JS 211131 Mainland China

title: Stylish Nanjiang City Break Overlooking Baijia Lake
description: Between tree-lined boulevards, ancient riverways and the shimmering waters of Baijia Lake, Crowne Plaza Nanjing Jiangning, an IHG Hotel is the perfect base for those exploring the historic Ming-dynasty capital. Wander the sprawling Linggu Temple complex, climb the steps of the Sun Yatsen Mausoleum and soak up the city’s incomparable heritage before returning to the hotel for authentic Huiayang cuisine or moments of repose by the mirage-like pool.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Nanjing Jiangning, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 9 Jiahu East Road, Jiangning District, Nanjing 211100, China
